###Simulations
```{r Simulations, echo = TRUE}
#number of simulations to run
simnum <- 10000

#number of distributions to generate
exp_n <- 40

#exponential distribution parameters
exp_lambda <- 0.2
expMean <- NULL
expVar <-NULL
for (a in 1:simnum) {
    expMean = c(expMean, mean(rexp(exp_n, exp_lambda)))
    expVar = c(expVar, var(rexp(exp_n, exp_lambda)))
}
```

###Plots Comparing Simulation to Population
```{r meanPlot, echo = TRUE}
#load ggplot2
library(ggplot2)

#Compare Means
popMean <- 1 / exp_lambda
simMean <- mean(expMean)
popMean
simMean

#Compare Means visually
plt <- ggplot() + aes(expMean) + 
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.3, colour = "black", fill = "white") +
    geom_vline(xintercept = 1 / exp_lambda, colour = "red")
plt
```

```{r varPlot, echo = TRUE}
#use Freedman-Diaconis rule for binwidth
bw <- round(diff(range(expVar) / (2 * IQR(expVar) / length(expVar)^(1/3))))

#Compare Variances
popVariance <- (1 / exp_lambda) ^ 2
simVariance <- mean(expVar)
popVariance
simVariance

#compare Variances visually
plt.two <- ggplot() + aes(expVar) +
    geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.3, colour = "black", fill = "white") +
    geom_vline(binwidth = bw, xintercept = (1 / exp_lambda)^2, colour = "red")
plt.two
```
